name: Trap Attack
description:
Trap Attack is a fast paced arcade game. Use your Teleporter tool to move around the map and avoid the traps that increase in number and difficulty as time goes on.

Characters

Choose from the available pair of mad scientists, Stein & Dana, the creators behind the traps they so thoroughly test! Or unlock new characters from the upcoming updates and seasonal events by completing the required event objectives.

Leaderboards

Satiate your competitive spirit and find out how good you really are at each level on the leaderboards.
